Metadata.title: Credat — The Trust Layer for AI Agents
Metadata.description: Give your AI agents an identity. Delegate permissions. Verify trust. Open-source TypeScript SDK for agent-to-agent and agent-to-service trust.
Metadata.ogDescription: Give your AI agents an identity. Delegate permissions. Verify trust. Open-source TypeScript SDK.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Your agent proves who it is. Services trust it. Done.

Hero.title: The Trust Layer for AI Agents
Hero.description: Give your agents an identity. Delegate permissions. Verify trust. Stop agent fraud before it starts.

identity.title: Agent Identity
identity.description: Every agent gets a verifiable, portable identity

typescript.title: TypeScript SDK
typescript.description: Type-safe APIs with complete IntelliSense support

delegation.title: Delegated Permissions
delegation.description: Scoped allowances so agents only do what they should

verification.title: Instant Verification
verification.description: Services verify agent identity and permissions in milliseconds

Dx.title: Agent Trust in 5 Lines of Code
Dx.description: Create an agent identity, delegate permissions with scoped allowances, and verify trust — all from a single, composable SDK.

Problem.title: AI Agents Are Everywhere. Trust Is Nowhere.

fraud.title: Agent Fraud
fraud.description: Any process can claim to be an agent. There's no standard way to verify it's who it says it is.

trust.title: Agent-to-Agent Trust
trust.description: When two agents need to collaborate, neither can prove its identity or capabilities to the other.

delegation.title: Delegation Verification
delegation.description: How does a service know an agent actually has permission from its owner? Today, it can't.

scope.title: Scope Control
scope.description: Agents need allowances — bounded permissions that limit what they can do. API keys don't cut it.

travel.title: Travel Booking Agent
travel.description: Your agent books flights and hotels on your behalf. Services verify it's authorized to spend up to your set limit — no API keys, no shared passwords.

finance.title: Financial Agent with Spending Limits
finance.description: Delegate a spending allowance to your agent. It can pay invoices, transfer funds, or manage subscriptions — all within the scope you defined.

multiAgent.title: Multi-Agent Workflows
multiAgent.description: Chain agents together where each one proves its identity and permissions to the next. Build complex pipelines where trust flows automatically.

devPlatform.title: Agent Platform Security
devPlatform.description: Run a marketplace where third-party agents interact with your APIs. Verify every agent's identity and scope before granting access.

personalAgent.title: Personal Assistant Agent
personalAgent.description: Your personal agent manages your calendar, emails, and tasks. It proves to every service that you authorized it — with exactly the right permissions.

Integrations.title: Everything You Need to Trust Agents

agentIdentity.title: Agent Identity
agentIdentity.description: Create portable, verifiable identities for AI agents. Each agent gets a unique identity tied to its owner's domain.

scoped.name: Scoped Permissions
scoped.description: Define exactly what an agent can do — book travel, spend up to $500, read emails — with typed scopes.

chain.name: Delegation Chains
chain.description: Agents can re-delegate subsets of their permissions to other agents. The chain is fully verifiable.

revoke.name: Instant Revocation
revoke.description: Revoke any agent's permissions at any time. Services see the change immediately.

sophie.quote: We needed a way to prove our agents were authorized. Credat gave us that in an afternoon. Dead simple API.
sophie.name: Sophie L.

marcus.quote: The delegation model is exactly what we needed. Scoped permissions for agents that just work. No overengineering.
marcus.name: Marcus W.

elena.quote: We run a multi-agent platform. Credat solved our biggest problem: knowing which agent is actually authorized to do what.
elena.name: Elena R.

james.quote: TypeScript-first, open source, and it handles the hard part — trust between agents — so we don't have to.
james.name: James C.

anna.quote: We evaluated building our own agent auth system. Credat saved us months and is more secure than what we would have built.
anna.name: Anna K.

pierre.quote: Finally someone is solving agent identity properly. Open source, developer-first, and built on real standards under the hood.
pierre.name: Pierre D.

agents.label: To Full Agent Trust
agents.description: Create an agent, delegate permissions, and verify trust — the entire flow in 5 lines of TypeScript.

bundle.label: Gzipped Bundle
bundle.description: Tree-shakeable ESM architecture. Import only what you need — identity, delegation, or verification.

openSource.label: Open Source
openSource.description: Apache-2.0 licensed. No vendor lock-in, no hidden fees. The only open-source, developer-first agent identity SDK.

create.title: Create an Agent
create.description: Give your agent a verifiable identity tied to your domain. One function call, no configuration.

delegate.title: Delegate Permissions
delegate.description: Define exactly what the agent can do with scoped allowances. Book travel, spend $500, read emails — you decide.

challenge.title: Challenge the Agent
challenge.description: When your agent arrives at a service, the service issues a challenge. The agent proves its identity and permissions.

verify.title: Verify Trust
verify.description: The service verifies the agent's identity, its owner's delegation, and the scopes — all in one call.

Cta.title: Stop Agent Fraud. Start Shipping Trust.
Cta.description: Credat is the open-source trust layer for AI agents. Give your agents an identity, delegate permissions, and verify trust — in 5 lines of code.

Footer.brand: The open-source trust layer for AI agents. Create identities, delegate permissions, verify trust — in 5 lines of TypeScript.

HeroFlow.ariaLabel: Agent trust flow: Owner delegates permissions to Agent, Agent presents credentials to Service for verification
